00049     class _OgreExport ParticleSystemRenderer : public StringInterface, public FXAlloc
00050     {
00051     public:
00053         ParticleSystemRenderer() {}
00055         virtual ~ParticleSystemRenderer() {}
00056 
00058         virtual const String& getType(void) const = 0;
00059 
00065         virtual void _updateRenderQueue(RenderQueue* queue, 
00066             list<Particle*>::type& currentParticles, bool cullIndividually) = 0;
00067 
00069         virtual void _setMaterial(MaterialPtr& mat) = 0;
00071         virtual void _notifyCurrentCamera(Camera* cam) = 0;
00073         virtual void _notifyAttached(Node* parent, bool isTagPoint = false) = 0;
00075         virtual void _notifyParticleRotated(void) {}
00077         virtual void _notifyParticleResized(void) {}
00079         virtual void _notifyParticleQuota(size_t quota) = 0;
00081         virtual void _notifyDefaultDimensions(Real width, Real height) = 0;
00083         virtual void _notifyParticleEmitted(Particle* particle) {}
00085         virtual void _notifyParticleExpired(Particle* particle) {}
00087         virtual void _notifyParticleMoved(list<Particle*>::type& currentParticles) {}
00089         virtual void _notifyParticleCleared(list<Particle*>::type& currentParticles) {}
00097         virtual ParticleVisualData* _createVisualData(void) { return 0; }
00105         virtual void _destroyVisualData(ParticleVisualData* vis) { assert (vis == 0); }
00106 
00110         virtual void setRenderQueueGroup(uint8 queueID) = 0;
00114         virtual void setRenderQueueGroupAndPriority(uint8 queueID, ushort priority) = 0;
00115 
00118         virtual void setKeepParticlesInLocalSpace(bool keepLocal) = 0;
00119 
00121         virtual SortMode _getSortMode(void) const = 0;
00122 
00127         virtual void visitRenderables(Renderable::Visitor* visitor, 
00128             bool debugRenderables = false) = 0;
00129 
00130     };
